synopsis.text:
Master fully crafted by Netrunner Magazine to commemorate their 5th anniversary, 'Netrun-mon THE MOVIE #1' is a delightful 30-minute original animation DVD. Directed by the talented Poyoyon Rock, known for 'Popotan,' this OVA introduces charming Netrunner characters like Nin'i-tan and friends.

BB Runner and Ranna, our dynamic duo, embark on a clandestine mission to aid the fatigued NetRunner magazine team in meeting their deadline. However, BB Runner's focus wavers when he hears a mysterious girl's voice on the internet. This girl, Chiyu, is a magical 12-year-old who seeks their assistance in thwarting an evil villain wreaking havoc in the Net World.

Drawn into cyberspace, BB Runner and Ranna find themselves in the midst of a thrilling adventure filled with adorable girls, such as Biscuit-tan. As they navigate through deceptive obstacles to halt the villainous Master and his 'Junkies' gang, our feathered heroes remain resolute. With the help of newfound friends, they strive to restore safety to the Net World and ultimately save the day!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
